attributes.title: ✨trash✨
attributes.review: It spammed and crashed my phone, gave news that was blatantly incorrect, offended my mother, and even threatened the lives of my friends. Absolute garbage

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is very hateful and truly makes me sick to know people support our joke of a president.  H s scared that we ruined his rally 🧚🏽‍♀️✨💕,well he ruined our lives. So Trump gets a “NO❤️”

attributes.review: So I tied to use the app but the angry little Cheeto jumped out of my screen and tried to delete TikTok so I squished him like a bug

attributes.title: thanks for coming
